image with caption component

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • image (required - the wireframes say to display a default image if an image is not given)
  • altText (optional, but highly recommend for SEO)
  • caption (optional)
  • link (optional)
  • hasGradient - true or false, will display a black gradient along the bottom so that the caption text is more visible (optional, true is the default)
